cookies_terms: We use cookies and other data tracking technologies to improve your browsing experience on our website, to show you personalized content and targeted ads, analyze our website traffic, and understand where our visitors are coming from.
welcome-text: MyPortfolio is a platform for conveniently posting your work.
email_confirm_text: To use our website, you need to confirm your email address. We have sent an email to {email}, if it hasn't arrived, click the "Resend" button to send it again.
seconds_ago: Just now | {n} second ago | {n} seconds ago
minutes_ago: Just now | {n} minute ago | {n} minutes ago
hours_ago: Just now | {n} hour ago | {n} hours ago

placeholders.about_me: Tell us a little about yourself

new_post.title: New publication in the section
new_post.max_file: The maximum size of one file is 10MB

password.new_send: A new password has been sent to you by email

email.string: Email address must be a string
email.lowercase: Email address must be in lowercase
email.unique: This email address is already registered

username.regex: The username can only consist of numbers and Latin characters

job.string: Place of work must be a string

0.string: The link must be a string

1.string: The link must be a string

2.string: The link must be a string

avatar.mimes: The file must be in PNG or JPEG format
